name: Limited Action Runner
description:
Limited Action Runner is a runner-genre game where the player's control options, such as jumping and sliding, has limited amount of usage. You need to acquire items on the run to resupply your quotas!

NOTICE: Frame rate could be low due to particular browser or hardware. If you run across frame rate issues, try using a different browser or install the game via itch.io desktop app.

This game was created in 48 hours during the event of GMTK Game Jam 2020.
